post_text:
We head to college in two weeks and we will be hanging up several IKEA pegboards to help with dorm room organization. However, our dorm room doesn‚Äôt allow residents to put any holes in the wall. In this video I will share how I hung the pegboards using Command Strips. These pegboards make great dorm room decor and are very reasonably priced at I
author: My Inspiration Corner

title: Can Command Hooks Hold a Snap On Box?
post_text:
Can Command Hooks really hold up a Snap-on key cabinet? In this 30-second garage hack, I show you how I mounted my metal Snap-on box without drilling a single hole. I added a custom wood spacer, hit it with some black spray paint, cleaned the surface with alcohol for max adhesion, and then let the Command Hooks do the heavy lifting. Clean, simple, and drill-free!

title: 33. Ditch pegboard for shadowboxing #mtbitesize #shorts #makethings
post_text: One of the biggest and costliest tool storage regrets I have is surrounding my garage walls with pegboard.  If you‚Äôre just starting out, my advice is to stay far away from this pressed paper: it‚Äôs ugly, weak, expensive, frustratingly cumbersome and I, myself, regret ever using it.  Because it has to be anchored away from the wall, you‚Äôll have to trim each section, which takes away hook placement.  If it‚Äôs not anchored to the wall right, you‚Äôll get dips as the pegboard will collapse under stress.
